analysis.key_quote: Civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications should not be reclassified as schedule F and further politicize what is supposed to be a neutral body in the NIH.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of civil service roles and the integrity of federally-funded science, indicating a defense of the current merit-based system.
